asteroids.game

Class ParticipantCountdownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.game.ParticipantCountdownTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ParticipantCountdownTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Provides objects that wait for a certain amount of time to pass before making a callback to a Participant's countdownComplete method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Participant participant
      Participant to be notified when time expires
      private java.lang.Object payload
      Payload that is passed to the countdownComplete method when it is called
      private javax.swing.Timer timer
      Internal timer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParticipantCountdownTimer(Participant p, int msecs)
      Constructs an object that waits for the given number of milliseconds to pass before invoking the countdownComplete method on p, passing null as its parameter.
      ParticipantCountdownTimer(Participant p, java.lang.Object payload, int msecs)
      Constructs an object that waits for the given number of milliseconds to pass before invoking the countdownComplete method on p, passing the payload as its parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      When the interval has passed, stops the timer and makes the callback, as long as the participant has not expired.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • payload

        private java.lang.Object payload
        Payload that is passed to the countdownComplete method when it is called

      • timer

        private javax.swing.Timer timer
        Internal timer

      • participant

        private Participant participant
        Participant to be notified when time expires

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticipantCountdownTimer

        public ParticipantCountdownTimer(Participant p,
                                 int msecs)
        Constructs an object that waits for the given number of milliseconds to pass before invoking the countdownComplete method on p, passing null as its parameter. The call is not made if p has expired.

      • ParticipantCountdownTimer

        public ParticipantCountdownTimer(Participant p,
                                 java.lang.Object payload,
                                 int msecs)
        Constructs an object that waits for the given number of milliseconds to pass before invoking the countdownComplete method on p, passing the payload as its parameter. The call is not made if p has expired.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        When the interval has passed, stops the timer and makes the callback, as long as the participant has not expired.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
